name: uiw-project
description: A high quality UI Toolkit, A Component Library for React 16+.

scripts.esm: lerna exec --scope @uiw/react-layout -- tsbb types --outDir lib/esm --target ESNEXT
scripts.cjs: lerna exec --scope @uiw/react-layout -- tsbb types --outDir lib/cjs --target ESNEXT
scripts.lib:watch: lerna exec --scope @uiw/react-layout -- tsbb watch --target react & npm run lib:css:watch
scripts.lib:type:watch: npm run esm -- --watch & npm run cjs -- --watch
scripts.lib:build: npm run lib && npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm run lib:css
scripts.type: npm run t:cjs && npm run t:esm
scripts.t:esm: lerna exec --scope @uiw/* --scope uiw --ignore @uiw/doc -- tsbb types --outDir lib/esm --target ESNEXT
scripts.t:cjs: lerna exec --scope @uiw/* --scope uiw --ignore @uiw/doc -- tsbb types --outDir lib/cjs --target ESNEXT
scripts.b:uiw: lerna exec --scope @uiw/* --scope uiw --ignore @uiw/doc -- tsbb build --target react
scripts.doc: npm run b:website && npm run b:doc
scripts.build: npm run b:uiw && npm run b:css && npm run type && npm run doc
scripts.bundle: npm run b:bundle && npm run b:bundle:min
